Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the RAD properly apply a reasonableness standard to assess the RPD's credibility findings?
Crimes.Outcome: Judicial review allowed, matter referred back to RAD for reevaluation
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Credibility issues due to inconsistencies in claim of persecution based on homosexuality
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Sections related to misrepresentation and refugee eligibility under IRPA
Crimes.Application_Error: RAD may have erred by not reassessing credibility independently
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Reasonableness vs. correctness in administrative review
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: RPD rejected claim, RAD initially upheld, Federal Court remanded
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Standard of review applied by RAD
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA provisions on misrepresentation and refugee protection
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Remanded for reconsideration without strict deference
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistencies in testimony and lack of corroboration
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Applicant challenged RAD's application of legal standard
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Improper application of deference in appeal

Crimes.Crime_Name: Use of False Documents for Immigration Purpose
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the RAD properly apply the reasonableness standard to the RPD's credibility findings?
Crimes.Outcome: Judicial review allowed, matter referred back to RAD
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Credibility issues due to use of false documents
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Sections related to document fraud and misrepresentation under IRPA
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Refugee claim involving use of forged documents
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Use of false documents affecting credibility
Crimes.Application_Error: RAD upheld decision despite potential errors, suggesting incorrect standard applied
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Reasonableness vs. correctness in administrative review
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: RPD rejected claim, RAD initially upheld, Federal Court remanded
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Standard of review applied by RAD
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA provisions on false documents and admissibility
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Use of false documents and credibility concerns
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Possession and use of forged immigration documents
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Applicant challenged RAD's legal standard application
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Improper application of deference in appeal
